questions.prompt: How many subsets are in set (P - Q)?
questions.hint: Count items in P only (3). Calculate 2³.

questions.prompt: Find the number of subsets in set Q.
questions.hint: Count ALL items in circle Q (Intersection + Right). That's 5 items. Calculate 2⁵.

questions.prompt: How many subsets from members in Q but not P?
questions.hint: Count items in Q only (2). Calculate 2².
